name: The Portland 75
description: This new twist on a French 75 evokes the scent of an Oregon forest.
recipeIngredient: 1/4 ounce Clear Creek Distillery Douglas Fir Eau de Vie
1/2 ounce freshly squeezed lemon juice from 1 lemon
4 dashes The Bitter Truth Lemon Bitters
5 ounces sparkling rosé wine such as Bugey Cerdon, chilled

recipeInstructions.text: Fill a mixing glass with ice. Add gin, Douglas Fir Eau de Vie, lemon juice, simple syrup, and lemon bitters. Stir until chilled, about 20 seconds. Strain into a Champagne flute and top with chilled sparkling rosé.
Express lemon peel over the drink and add peel to the glass as a garnish.
